message:
I’ve implemented the `tdpo_loss` function in `trainers.py` according to the Token-level DPO formulation from the paper:

- Rewards per example:  
  chosen_rewards   = β·(chosen_logps_margin)   – α·(chosen_position_kl)  
  rejected_rewards = β·(rejected_logps_margin) – α·(rejected_position_kl)  
- Loss per example:  
  losses = –logsigmoid(chosen_rewards – rejected_rewards)  
- Returns `(losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards)`.

You can now train and evaluate your model with this loss. Let me know if you need any further assistance!
